Title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
Writer: Lawrence Kasdan (screenplay), George Lucas (screenplay), George Lucas (story)
Actors: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams
Plot: After rescuing Han Solo from the palace of Jabba the Hutt, the rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to make Vader shake off of the dark side of the Force.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 12 wins & 14 nominations.
